## Discussion

Create an object that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEditMenuInteractionDelegate] protocol and assign it to this property. The interaction uses the system delegate if no delegate is provided (if you pass in `nil`).

# init(delegate:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an edit menu interaction object with the delegate object you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(delegate: (any UIEditMenuInteractionDelegate)?)
```

## Discussion

Create an object that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEditMenuInteractionDelegate] protocol and assign it to this property. The interaction uses the system delegate if no delegate is provided (if you pass in `nil`).
title: init(delegate:)
